API

Welcome to the Madaster platform!

On this page you will find additional information about the use and development of the Madaster platform.

Manuals

General manuals

  • Open the Madaster Quick Start Guide – this briefly describes the necessary steps from registration to the creation of a materials passport in Madaster.
  • Open the Madaster User manual – this describes in detail the functionalities of the Madaster platform and how to apply them.

BIM-specific manuals & templates

  • Open the Madaster Manual IFC-export (Archicad & Revit) – this briefly describes the steps to export an IFC file from Archicad and Revit
  • Download the Madaster IFC export template for Archicad - this includes the most optimal export settings for a IFC file to the Madaster platform.
  • Read the Madaster BIM-guidelines – this briefly describes the most important instructions for the preparation of a BIM model.
  • Download the Madaster Smart View set (BIMCollab) – import this file into the BIMCollab Zoom solution to validate the quality of your IFC file.
  • Download the BIMCollab Zoom solution(free IFC-viewer) and corresponding Quick Start Guide.
  • Interesting general information about BIM is available through the BIM loket.

Reference works

  • Read the Madaster Circulariteit Indicator explaned document – this describes in detail the operation of the Madaster Circularity Indicator (MCI) as well as the underlying methodology.

Madaster Servicedesk

Do you have questions? Contact Madaster by telephone 085-0657436 or e-mailadress service@madaster.com.
